div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 769 Sumen (formerly Kolarovgrad) environs, Bulgaria, 1946 Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: 112 AR. Pot hoard Apollonia Pontica: tetrob. Disposition: Sumen coll. Gerasimov, Musée National Bulgare: Fouilles et Recherches 1 (1948), pp. 134-49, illus.; BIAB 17 (1950), p. 319 Le Rider, Deux trésors, p. 52, note 4
